mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_member (mb_id, mb_password, mb_nick, mb_proimg, mb_name, mb_birth, mb_tel, mb_email, mb_addr) VALUES (#{mb_id}, #{mb_password}, #{mb_nick}, #{mb_proimg}, #{mb_name}, #{mb_birth}, #{mb_tel}, #{mb_email}, #{mb_addr})
mapper.select: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tb_member( mb_seq BIGINT, mb_id VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, mb_password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, mb_nick VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, mb_proimg VARCHAR(100), mb_name VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, mb_birth VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, mb_tel VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, mb_email VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, mb_addr VARCHAR(200) )
